entry.title: NAVY STICKER SHORTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: SHORTS
Price: 4200.00

Description

The NAVY STICKER SHORTS are stylish Bermuda shorts in navy, crafted from 100% cotton for breathable comfort. Featuring an adjustable elastic waistband with drawstrings, front pleats, and functional front and rear pockets, these shorts combine style with practicality. The bold sticker print adds a playful streetwear vibe, making them perfect for casual outings. Weighing 260 GSM, they are durable yet soft. Pair these Navy Stickery Shorts or Navy Blue Bermuda Shorts with oversized t-shirts and sneakers for effortless everyday style.

Details

100% cotton

Weight - 260 GSM

Screen Print

Reverse Wash only

shipping

Packed within 24 hours.

Free delivery Pan-India.

Dispatches Next Day.

entry.title: BLACK SHENRON 3 SHORTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: SHORTS
Price: 4200.00

Description

The BLACK SHENRON 3 SHORTS are premium black baggy shorts crafted from 100% cotton (260 GSM) for all-day comfort. Featuring an adjustable elasticated waistband with drawstrings, front pleats, and practical pockets, they combine style and functionality effortlessly. The bold dragon screen print adds a fierce, eye-catching streetwear vibe, making these shorts a standout piece. Perfect with tees, hoodies, or sneakers, these cotton shorts deliver relaxed fit, comfort, and a powerful statement look inspired by legendary dragon artwork.

Description

With a relaxed fit and clean silhouette, these terry cotton blue joggers bring effortless style to your off-duty days. The deep blue shade is easy to pair, while the adjustable waistband and cuffed hems keep it casual yet refined.

Whether you're lounging or stepping out, these blue joggers deliver on both form and function. A must-have for anyone who loves keeping it basic, bold, and comfy.

entry.title: BLACK RIPSTOP CARGOS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: Jeans
Price: 14995.00

Description

Bluorng black ripstop cargo is in black colour. The design is inspired from Bluorng’s take on cargos. The material is premium quality and textured; doesnt rip. The cargos are convertible into shorts and can be styled in multiple ways. There are 2 detachable pockets, low hanging suspenders on each side and 12 more multipurpose pockets. The fit is a Bluorng’s baggy flared fit.
